tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES blockchain_participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT NOT NULL,
    receiver_id INT NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  public_key TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id INT,
  receiver_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_blocks (
  block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  previous_block_id INT,
  nonce INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_wallets (
  wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id INT,
  balance DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_verification (
  verification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_id INT,
  verified_at TIMESTAMP
)
